Clean the bathroom.cdl:
behavior fill_sink_with_water(sink:item):
    body:
        if is_sink_near_faucet_1(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            achieve has_water(sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
Clean the bathroom.source_sub_task: 2. Fill the sink with water and add soap to create soapy water.
functions:
def is_sink_near_faucet_1(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink is near to a faucet
    symbol near_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return near_faucet

Clean the bathroom.cdl:
behavior add_soap_to_water(sink:item, soap:item):
    body:
        achieve inside(soap, sink)

    # Determine whether this sink is near to a faucet

Clean the bathroom.cdl:
behavior create_soapy_water(sink:item):
    body:
        bind soap: item where:
            is_soap(soap)
        add_soap_to_water(sink, soap)

functions:
def is_sink_near_faucet_1(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink is near to a faucet
    symbol near_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return near_faucet

Clean the bathroom.cdl:
behavior clean_sink(sink:item):
    body:
        if has_faucet_1(sink):
            bind faucet: item where:
                is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet, sink)
            achieve_once is_on(faucet)
            rinse(sink)
            scrub(sink)
            rinse(sink)
            achieve_once is_off(faucet)
functions:
def has_faucet_1(sink:item):
    # Determine whether this sink has a faucet
    symbol has_faucet=exists faucet:item: is_faucet(faucet) and close(faucet,sink)
    return has_faucet
